suite.name: AmazonBestSellerTest

test.name: Verify user is able to naviage to the Amazon main page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify six items displayed on Best Sellers in Sports & Outdoors category
Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
